cluster_relations.rel_desc: Forensic scientists collect and analyze evidence.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: A forensic or investigative actor examines evidence or data to extract information, patterns, or insights.

qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: in the course of forensic investigations

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Forensic scientists investigate the crime scene by meticulously documenting its details.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Denotes that an investigator examines or investigates a crime scene or context.

args.justification: Both relations describe actions performed by forensic scientists as part of investigative work (analyzing evidence and investigating the crime scene). They are closely related investigative activities and should share a unified relation class to avoid unnecessary fragmentation of the schema while keeping the broad group AGENCY unchanged.
args.remark: Normalized the relation class to a single forensic_investigation_activity_relation for both cognitive analysis of evidence and scene investigation activities.

executed_decisions.justification: Both relations describe actions performed by forensic scientists as part of investigative work (analyzing evidence and investigating the crime scene). They are closely related investigative activities and should share a unified relation class to avoid unnecessary fragmentation of the schema while keeping the broad group AGENCY unchanged.
executed_decisions.remark: Normalized the relation class to a single forensic_investigation_activity_relation for both cognitive analysis of evidence and scene investigation activities.
